name: MakeUp Artist Website
projects.description: Web app built for a makeup artist using React, Flask and PostGreSQL. The site includes a blog, instagram-style portfolio and custom admin panel.

name: Weather Web App
projects.description: Web app that displays climate information for any city. This application was created with React.

name: Weather Mobile App
projects.description: Mobile app version of the 'Weather Web App'. This application was created with React Native.

name: Billboard Top 100 Songs Game
projects.description: Web app that creates a gessing-game from the current Billboard Top 100 Songs. This application utilizes React, Flask and SQLite.

name: BlackJack Game
projects.description: Our beloved game of BlackJack, but created solely with Python. Give it a try.

name: Tic Tac Toe Game
projects.description: A classic game of tic-tac-toe create with React Native.

name: Event Scheduler
projects.description: Add an event, view it, delete it. This Web app allows the user to create and keep track of events.

name: Event Scheduler Mobile App
projects.description: A mobile version of the previous 'Event Scheduler' web app.

name: Monster Dungeon Game
projects.description: Don't let the monsters catch your character! You must run from the monsters and collect eggs. Another game created with Object oriented python.

name: HangMan Game
projects.description: Can't go wrong with playing hangman. A classic game built with Python.
